branchCategory.name: Lubricators
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's lubricators are available in several configurations to provide lubrication to your equipment. Modular models are available to connect directly to filter and regulator units to create a single air  preparation module for a machine. Stand-alone micro mist and high flow lubricators can be used to meet more demanding or higher volume needs. All feature simple adjustability and easy maintenance.</p>

branchItem.name: AL-A
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's newest AL modular style lubricator provides accurate lubrication of downstream equipment.  The AL bowl (size 30 and 40) is covered with a transparent bowl guard, allowing 360° monitoring. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The AL modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. </P>

branchItem.name: ALD
ALF
ALT
branchItem.description: <P>Auto feed tank series ALT is used with the auto feed lube unit series ALF. This system makes lubrication work unnecessary, thus significantly reducing the amount of maintenance labor. The problem of running out of oil is prevented because the oil is fed automatically. </P>

branchItem.name: LMU
branchItem.description: <P>The series LMU spray unit is used to deliver atomized lubrication to up to six individual points. Air pressure, air flow lubricant quantity independently adjustable. The unit is electrically switched to spray lubricant or, as required to blow air only. The LMU can be used to spray oil, kerosene, cutting fluid and a wide range of other fluids. It has applications in machine tools, roll forming machines, die casting for the spraying of mold release and other manufacturing processes where lubricant or coolant spray is required. </P>

branchItem.name: LMV
AL
branchItem.description: <P>AL series lubricators are available in several configurations to provide lubrication to your equipment. Modular models are available to connect directly to filter and regulator units to create a single air preparation module for a machine. Stand-alone micro mist and high flow lubricators can be used to meet more demanding or higher volume needs. All feature simple adjustability and easy maintenance.</P>

branchItem.name: AEP100
branchItem.description: The AEP collectors help prevent waste by collecting valuable hydraulic fluid and lubricant that has leaked and built up in the vicinity of machinery
